FF15.Title: Final Fantasy TTRPG
FF15.Description: A Foundry VTT system for the Square Enix TTRPG Final Fantasy XIV.

Welcome.Issues: If you have any issues, please report them on

DontShowWelcome.Name: Don't show this message again
DontShowWelcome.Hint: Don't show the welcome application when Foundry first loads. (You can always undo this via Configure Settings).

applicationWindowHeaderIconsOnly.Name: Show App Header Icons Only
applicationWindowHeaderIconsOnly.Hint: Only show icons in the application window header. This will reduce the amount of space the header takes up.
